```{r}
# clear environment
rm(list = ls())

# turn this off if you want scientific notation
options(scipen = 999)

# change wd
current_wd <- dirname(rstudioapi::getSourceEditorContext()$path)
setwd(current_wd)

# get list of all csv files in the folder
files <- list.files(pattern = "*.csv")
```

```{r}
for (y in 1:length(files)){
  
  # this prints the filename
  print(files[y])
  
  # read the csv file
  data <- read_csv(files[y])
}

```

```{r}
data %>% 
  select(rt, stimulus,  response, trial_index, task, phase, webgazer_data, correct_response)->df
```
